Author: akinamai
Text: I would wait at least a year tbh before making any decisions tbh. I gained and lost about 25lbs over the course of 1 year and then over the next six months I swear my body changed as much as it had during the losing phase. Everything just redistributed properly and I look SO much better and less lumpy now even though I have been more or less maintaining.

Author: Swanabe
Text: I’m in a similar position except I’m older than you and will have lost much more weight and probably have much more loose skin (I already have some and I’m not even done losing!). I’ve accepted that surgery is an inevitability and I’ve embraced it.   Start saving and doing research now. In the meantime treat your skin well, and try to gain muscle so your surgical outcomes will be as great as possible
